title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete the analysis of rocket propulsion systems focusing on efficiency and performance metrics.

title: Combustion Analysis

description: Perform detailed orbital calculations for various mission scenarios.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering rocket systems engineering principles.
